attributes.action: sack any MP who is found to have claimed money for goods and services they were not entitled to
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of the revelations concerning MPs who have been found to be claiming every last penny they can from the British taxpayers who are suffering in the worst financial crisis to hit this country for many years, it is only right and proper that everyone of them who has been caught in the act should resign immediately or be sacked from the Cabinet.  In addition where they have been found to have acted unlawfully they should prosecuted and face the full force of the law.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
